Posts.EditableText: When I finish my game, I'd like to upload it to my blog and also allow people to play it online from there, so could you add a feature to export to the web browser.
Posts.HTML: When I finish my game, I'd like to upload it to my blog and also allow people to play it online from there, so could you add a feature to export to the web browser.

Posts.EditableText: You could do this already by uploading to textadventures.co.uk, then using an iframe on your blog page to embed the "play online" url.
Posts.HTML: You could do this already by uploading to textadventures.co.uk, then using an iframe on your blog page to embed the "play online" url.
